thread.title: Karnataka will regain winning ways, says Arvind
thread.title_full: Karnataka will regain winning ways, says Arvind

title: Karnataka will regain winning ways, says Arvind
text:
Karnataka will regain winning ways, says Arvind Karnataka will regain winning ways, says Arvind October 19, 2015, Bengaluru, DHNS 
Having drawn their first three group games, Karnataka’s Ranji Trophy title defence hasn’t got off to a rousing start but left-arm pacer S Arvind feels that it is too early to press the panic button. “Despite not having produced our first win yet, we have been playing good cricket and we are improving with every match. We did well to get the first innings lead and gather three points against Bengal and Vidarbha. In the coming matches, we will make sure we get back to our winning ways and go on top of the table,” said a confident Arvind.Arvind also admitted that the race for the quarterfinals has already begun and Karnataka are aware about their responsibilities ahead.
